body_html: Have you tried -mno-thumb in your compiler settings? From memory this helped when I was trying to cross-compile for the Pi (which I ended up giving up on in the end, and compiling natively on-device).
body_text: Have you tried -mno-thumb in your compiler settings? From memory this helped when I was trying to cross-compile for the Pi (which I ended up giving up on in the end, and compiling natively on-device).
body: Have you tried -mno-thumb in your compiler settings? From memory this helped when I was trying to cross-compile for the Pi (which I ended up giving up on in the end, and compiling natively on-device).
